channel.title: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
channel.description:
I want to know if there is a way to make custom items on my server and also can i change the name of like dragon armor to like Red God Armor... I've tried it in the item.cfg and the items.xml still didnt work any help here i would be greatful
btw i use a testscape souce base server

item.title: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Destiny Pure Destiny
item.description:
@Pure_Destiny wrote:

[quote=“Motoguyx378, post:17, topic:6636”]Wanna know how? Go into the TUTORIAL SECTION!
And to change the name of an object it would be in Item.config.[/quote]Are you dumb or something?

  1. There are no tutorials on this, I think last time I checked.
  2. This is a 3 year old question
  3. This has already been answered

Read full topic
item.source: Making Custom itmes and Changing names

item.title: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

i would just get INTs off of moparscape (theres a recoloring thread somewhere here that has a bunch of INTs I use… =p), then just recolor the items and re name it. Im guessing you want the item red, since the name has red in it, so use the color 926 (dragon red) for the new color

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zardoz wrote:

When u spawn does it spawn the lava version or the original version? Or does the lava
Version need it’s own item code? Cause I’ve seen servers with more
Than one different kinds of whips (white, red, blue, yellow, etc.) how do you have more than one version? And do they all need there own code?

item.title: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

i Would like to add to what jb blaze said also if you want to change the name of it in class 8 where you put your armour code where it says class8.aString170 = “Bandos Platelegs”; change it too class8.aString170 = “Red God Armour”; and it will show up as red god armour in the server

Read full topic
item.source: Making Custom itmes and Changing names

item.title: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

in order to recolor items, you need to go to the CLIENT your using, and go to class 8

say u wanted to edit bandos platelges you would put this in the file

if(i == 15064)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10266;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9523;
class8.anInt181 = 1740;
class8.anInt190 = 444;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = -8;
class8.anInt165 = 5024;
class8.anInt200 = 5025;
class8.anInt174 = 5026;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Bandos Platelegs”;

were it says “wear” alows you to wear the item, at the bottom is the name. name what u like. at the very begging is the item id, so you can add to your source in the items.cfg file. this: class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10266;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9523; are the color mixtures. i changed it to look like lava. so i made lava armour :). thats your basic recoloring. adding custom items like wings. (seene em) you need a 3d render, and modeler. then you need to script it and make it a dat. file then make it into an item id and again add it to the class8 file so it the client recognizes it as the new item. and not a null. have fun

Read full topic
item.source: Making Custom itmes and Changing names
